title: Episode 2
description: Listen in to our insightful conversation with Brian Geisel, the CEO of Symage and Geisel Software as he gives powerful insight into his work with NASA on Space exploration, robotics device automation and how, by keeping a listening ear, he was able to strategically develop a product company from a services company.
gdescription: In this episode, Brian also details his philosophy on integrity in business and what it means to be centered by faith.

title: Episode 1
description: Welcome to our first episode! Listen in to hear our insightful conversation with Nick Carter, the Founder and CEO of INGENIOUS.BUILD about his journey to raise $37 million in Series A funding, his startup strategy secrets, hiring a super star team and more!
gdescription: Nick Carter is the Founder & CEO of INGENIOUS.BUILD, leading a $10B+ tech revolution in construction. A serial entrepreneur with multiple exits, heâ€™s also a partner at Airframe Innovations, investing in early-stage startups. Beyond business, Nick is an ultra-marathon runner, Ironman, and Jiu-Jitsu athlete.
